thread.title: Jennifer Meeghan
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by Jennifer Meeghan

author: Jennifer Meeghan
title: Jennifer Meeghan
text: We found our pram in a big store in Wigan but then found the exact same deal on Kiddies Kingdom for almost Â£200 cheaper. The store would not price match so we ditched them and went with the website. It was ordered on the Saturday morning and delivered by Tuesday am. The pieces all went together so easily and the pram is smart, I can't wait to use it.
